ygData.subject: RE: Websites
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, it s an Apache web server based on a Mac.  That much I know, I used to work for the webhost Pinkpig.com.  I suppose I *could* create manual
ygData.messageBody:
At 06:11 PM 1/5/00 -0500, you wrote:
>On Wed, 5 Jan 2000, Talies the Wanderer wrote:
>
> > If only I knew how to do that ;)
> >
> > Talies
>
>Well, the fact that your pages end in .htm implies it's
>probably an NT server. But under Unix, assuming the original
>page is at "bard/eqbards.htm" all you'd have to do is:


Actually, it's an Apache web server based on a Mac. That much I know, I
used to work for the webhost Pinkpig.com. I suppose I *could* create
manual copies of everything, or forwarding pages - but I really don't want
to have to do that with /bard/

Talies
